summary:
Leather Tents and bedroll texture + Frostfall version + bright leather versions
Special: Frostfall backpack normal map fix
descriptionHtml:
News:
1. New Overall version for Frostfall users is able to download! :)
2. Frostfall backpack fix Standalone is able to download.
3. HOT: new bright leather version is on optional download list ;)
4. HOT: new Overall bright leather version for Frostfall is on main download list ;)

Description:

1. "Leather Tents and bedroll by uncheat" includes:
Leather Tent + bedroll texture and color for small and large imperial tent
Options: bright and dark versions (bright version is on a optional list).

2. "Leather Tents and bedroll overall patch for Frostfall" includes:
All new textures and normalmap fixes for Frostfall (check screenshot named "Overall").
Options: bright and dark versions (select one).

3. Optional "Frostfall backpack normal map fix Standalone" - includes:
Only Frostfall backpack and roll on it normalmap fix.

Changes (in comparison with the vanilla style):
1. Recolored small tent now it looks like leather not like orange rubber
2. Recolored bedroll now it looks like leather not like orange rubber
3. Doubled large tent texture size and retextured with quality texture from small one (so it's 100% lore-friendly), same color-correction as made on small one, so finally it has HQ texture

Ð¡ompatibility:
100% (changed only textures)
Should work with Frostfall tents and other camp mods which use global game textures.

Future plans (all done):
1. Upload bedroll retexture on the frosfall's backpack (waiting for Chesko's answer). - done!
2. Upload fix for frosfall's backpack normal map that fixes normalmap that causes backpack always look like wet one (waiting for Chesko's answer). - done!
3. Add more optional colors for tents and bedrolls. - done! new bright version is able to download



Installation:
Use NMM or Install it manually by unpacking it on Skyrim's folder
Notice:
All versions are standalone, so there is no need to download everything to get all new fixes and textures. Just pick up one file you wanna get.


Recommended immersion mods:
Frostfall - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163/?
Cheskos Wearable Lanterns - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17416/?
Glass fix for Cheskos Wearable Lanterns - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52348/?
Convenient Horses - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14950/?

Credits and thanks:
Chesko for his great Frostfall mod and permission to upload this texture and fix mod
author: Uncheat
